de.dixti.jarscan
Class JarScan

java.lang.Object
  de.dixti.jarscan.JarScan

public class JarScan
extends java.lang.Object

JarScan is the central class for scanning archives. It conatins the algorithms for scanning. Programmers who use JarScan as a library will use this class.

Constructor Summary

          Creates an JarScan object with certain options.

Method Detail

scan

public Result scan()
            throws JarScanException
Starts scanning.

Returns:
a list with result information about the scanned jars
Throws:
JarScanException

getPrinter

public Printer getPrinter()
Returns the Printer that JarScan uses to print the results. The Default-Printer is ConsolePrinter.

Returns:
the Printer

setPrinter

public void setPrinter(Printer printer)
Sets the Printer that JarScan uses to print the results. The Default-Printer is ConsolePrinter. If you do not want that anything is printed set the Printer to null.

Parameters:
printer - the Printer
